channel.title: admin on Rihad Variawa
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Rihad Variawa

item.description: Hey, I’m Rihad! I am the Senior Data Scientist at Malastare AI and head of global Fintech Research, responsible for overall vision and strategy, investment priorities and offering development. Working in the financial services industry, helping clients adopt new technologies that can transform the way they transact and engage with their customers. I am passionate about data science, super inquisitive and challenge seeker; looking at everything through a lens of numbers and problem-solver at the core.
